s.text: "So Sad" was the tabloid Daily Mirror 's headline, referring to Ali's physical condition, but most papers ran eulogies of the former boxing hero.
The Greek government recently stepped up its long-running campaign to get them back and got the British Museum to admit that it bungled their restoration in 1938.
The Greek government recently stepped up its long-running campaign to get them back and got the British Museum to admit that it bungled their restoration in 1938.
The Greek government recently stepped up its long-running campaign to get them back and got the British Museum to admit that it bungled their restoration in 1938.

A recent editorial in the National Post of Canada, a conservative daily, assumed that this was the case and said it "would elevate historic sentiment over legality, creating in the process a chaotic precedent for dispersing the world's great archaeological collections."
